Articles.Content:
Got the game about a week ago because it looked like a lot of fun. But since getting it I've had problems. As you can see in the photo I linked below my staging isn't showing up so I can't launch my rocket. This is a sporadic problem since it comes and goes. Last night for example the game worked (for the most part) totally fine and I could launch rockets no problem. Now after loading up the game I can't launch anything.

http://gyazo.com/903b5954f71463c9edfcce4dbc3d4989

I have the following mods:

IXS_Class_for_InterstellarLite

KAS_0.4.10

B9_Aerospace_Pack_R5-2-8

BioDomes

KW Release Package v2.6d

HyperEdit 1.3 - for KSP 0.90+

Chatterer_v0.8.0

They all play nicely together since I added them one at a time and went in the game as well as them working fine last night. Is there a fix to this? Chatterer also doesn't work but thats not a big deal to me.

I will attempt to add some crash reports I have maybe they can help solve the problem.

https://drive.google.com/folderview?id=0BwnJMhGCji-yTVJ1M3hVT0Z5Zzg&usp=sharing

Please try removing KAS and check if the issue persists.

If yes, remove Hyperedit and try again.

I believe it's either one of them.

If it still persists, try removing every mod until you find which one caused it, then try to run the game only with that one.

Also try to update/reinstall all the mods, or at least KAS and Hyperedit.

This issue happened before, there was a fix but I have no idea what it was.
I saw this recently but can't remember what happened, might have been caused by an addon or a bad craft.

I launch the game off of steam but read that 64 bit version causes issues. Does launching it off steam default to 64 bit? In the Kerbal folder theres a KSP and KSP x64. Is KSP the 32 bit one and I should be launching off that? Also I've been reading problems with these mods since apparently KSP was recently updated these mods might have issues. Did I just come in at a bad time where mods are acting up because of it.

Crashing seems to have gone away...mostly. But now Im having problems with the mod IXS_Class_for_InterstellarLite. Basically when I mouse over the item it grows in size. Linked a gif down below. I've had problems with mods in general as you can see but this is definitely a first for this mod. And whats weird is I am using the same "version" as I was before. I haven't done a fresh download from curse. So this is a totally new problem from out of nowhere.

http://gyazo.com/e2fe134676457155837a552dbe984aa9
